title: Riot, why you do hate Aatrox so much, huh? Why you do keep nerfing him instead of buffing him?
body:
Did he kick your ass before that you do not want to buff so that he do not kick your ass again? LOL xd even Riot is scared of buffing Aatrox, cuz he is like the terror in every single lol player's heart, even riot is scared of him, they will just keep nerfing him.

Aatrox's name alone is enough to win a game and defeat the enemies, when they see the name they remember their horible past that why they flee.

WATCH THEM FLEE!

replies.body: The hell you on about they gave him a massive buff yesterday
